author: automotivetestingtechnologyinternational.com
title: Latest News : Automotive Testing Technology International
text:
SHOW NEWS: Modular pressure controller/calibrator
Fluke Calibration used the show to debut its latest 6270A modular pressure controller/calibrator, which can be used to calibrate a wide range of gauges and sensors with a single instrument.
As visitors were told at the event, it has a wide measurement range – vacuum to 20MPa (3,000psi) and two levels of accuracy – 0.02% FS or 0.01% reading. Equipped with a localized graphical user interface, Fluke Calibration’s regional sales manager David Patterson said the new controller/calibrator is easy to operate and maintain.
“It also has removable pressure modules, which enable users to hot swap them from the panel and only ship individual modules in for calibration, not the entire module,” added Patterson.
